unnormalised: **Automotive Sector Gears Up with Diverse Vehicle Launches**
normalised: **Automotive Sector Gears Up with Diverse Vehicle Launches**

unnormalised: The Indian automotive landscape is witnessing a flurry of activity with several new vehicle launches across different segments. Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam Technological University, Thiruvananthapuram, recently hosted a seminar focusing on innovative designs in electric vehicles, just as manufacturers roll out new offerings.
normalised: The Indian automotive landscape is witnessing a flurry of activity with several new vehicle launches across different segments. Doctor A P J Abdul Kalam Technological University, Thiruvananthapuram, recently hosted a seminar focusing on innovative designs in electric vehicles, just as manufacturers roll out new offerings.

unnormalised: Maruti Suzuki launched the upgraded Baleno, emphasizing enhanced fuel efficiency and safety features. Meanwhile, Tata Motors unveiled its much-anticipated micro-SUV, the Punch, targeting young professionals in urban areas like Bangalore and Mumbai. Its showroom footprint will expand by approximately 20,000 sq ft.
normalised: Maruti Suzuki launched the upgraded Baleno, emphasizing enhanced fuel efficiency and safety features. Meanwhile, Tata Motors unveiled its much-anticipated micro-S U V, the Punch, targeting young professionals in urban areas like Bangalore and Mumbai. Its showroom footprint will expand by approximately twenty thousand square feet.

unnormalised: These launches range from budget-friendly options costing around Rs. 6 Lakh to premium SUVs exceeding Rs. 40 Lakh. Key factors influencing consumer choices include mileage, safety ratings by Global NCAP, and of course, the 'kitna deti hai?' (fuel efficiency) question.
normalised: These launches range from budget-friendly options costing around rupee six lakh to premium S U Vs exceeding rupee forty lakh. Key factors influencing consumer choices include mileage, safety ratings by Global N C A P, and of course, the 'kitna deti hai?' (fuel efficiency) question.

unnormalised: The rising demand for vehicles capable of handling diverse terrains, from the Himalayan foothills to the plains of the Gangetic basin, is driving the development of robust SUVs and pickup trucks. Future vehicles may even boast ADAS (Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems) rivaling global standards. Expect range improvements in EVs exceeding 500 km on a single charge soon.
normalised: The rising demand for vehicles capable of handling diverse terrains, from the Himalayan foothills to the plains of the Gangetic basin, is driving the development of robust S U Vs and pickup trucks. Future vehicles may even boast A D A S (Advanced Driver-Assistance Systems) rivaling global standards. Expect range improvements in E Vs exceeding five hundred kilometer on a single charge soon.
